name: International Paralympic Committee
goal:
Vision: To enable Para athletes to achieve sporting excellence and inspire and excite the world.

Aspiration: To make for a more inclusive society for people with an impairment through Para sport.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: Bilateral meetings with EU Parliamentarians and Members of the EU commission to raise awareness for the Paralympic Movement and Para-Sport.
